Package com.stasroshchenko.diploma.model.service.user

Class ApplicationUserService

java.lang.Object
com.stasroshchenko.diploma.model.service.user.ApplicationUserService
@Service public class ApplicationUserService extends Object
Delegates all the processing to ApplicationUserServiceReal. Used for renaming some overridden methods of real service.
Version:
1.0
Author:
staffsterr2000

    • isUsernameAndEmailAbsent

      public boolean isUsernameAndEmailAbsent​(ApplicationUser rawUser)
      Checks for username and email absence in DB.
      Parameters:
      rawUser - raw user without password encoding.
      Returns:
      bool of the absence (true - absent).
      Since:
      1.0

    • checkUsernameAndEmailPresence

      public ApplicationUser checkUsernameAndEmailPresence​(ApplicationUser rawUser)
      Checks for username and email absence in DB. Causes exception if user with such data is present.
      Parameters:
      rawUser - applicationUser to check is this rawUser is in the base
      Returns:
      rawUser if this user is not in the base
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this username/email has already been taken
      Since:
      1.0

    • enableUserByEmail

      public void enableUserByEmail​(String email)
      Seeks the user by its email and enables the user.
      Parameters:
      email - user's email by which user will be found and then the user will be enabled.
      Since:
      1.0

    • signUpUser

      public String signUpUser​(ApplicationUser rawUser)
      Encodes the user instance and signs it up.
      Parameters:
      rawUser - raw user without password encoding.
      Returns:
      confirmation token UUID.
      Since:
      1.0

    • resendConfirmationToken

      public String resendConfirmationToken​(ApplicationUser user)
      Deletes old one token, creates new one and returns it.
      Parameters:
      user - user who needs new token.
      Returns:
      new confirmation token UUID.
      Since:
      1.0
